message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. It's a unique opportunity to get a great deal on a product that's still very useful. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products in the past. What do you think? Will you take advantage of this offer?
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, and I'd like to see more information before making a decision.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I'd be happy to provide more information about this product. Let me tell you that it's a great value for the price, and many of our customers have been satisfied with their purchases. In fact, I can offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not happy with the product, you can return it for a full refund. What do you think now? Will you give it a try?
Thank you for the offer, but I'm still not convinced about the quality of the product. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with the best possible products. Since you're not convinced about this one, I'll offer you a special deal. Will you take advantage of this unique opportunity?
